Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
@RestControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the Library Management System. Provides centralized exception handling and standardized error responses for REST APIs.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva

  • Method Details

    • handleNotFoundExceptions

      @ExceptionHandler({MemberNotFoundException.class,ItemNotFoundException.class,LoanNotFoundException.class}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleNotFoundExceptions(RuntimeException ex, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles resource not found exceptions (Member, Item, Loan not found).
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception that was thrown
      request - the HTTP request that caused the exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with NOT_FOUND status and error details

    • handleItemNotAvailable

      @ExceptionHandler(ItemNotAvailableException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleItemNotAvailable(ItemNotAvailableException ex, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles item not available exceptions.
      Parameters:
      ex - the ItemNotAvailableException that was thrown
      request - the HTTP request that caused the exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CONFLICT status and error details

    • handleIllegalArgument

      @ExceptionHandler(IllegalArgumentException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleIllegalArgument(IllegalArgumentException ex, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles illegal argument exceptions (validation errors).
      Parameters:
      ex - the IllegalArgumentException that was thrown
      request - the HTTP request that caused the exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with BAD_REQUEST status and error details

    • handleIllegalState

      @ExceptionHandler(IllegalStateException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleIllegalState(IllegalStateException ex, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles illegal state exceptions (business rule violations).
      Parameters:
      ex - the IllegalStateException that was thrown
      request - the HTTP request that caused the exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with CONFLICT status and error details

    • handleGenericException

      @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ApiError> handleGenericException(Exception ex, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles all other uncaught exceptions.
      Parameters:
      ex - the exception that was thrown
      request - the HTTP request that caused the exception
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR status and generic error message
